pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hammer of Thyrion is a port of Raven's Hexen II source code to support Linux, FreeBSD, other unices and Windows.

use.flag: Use x86 assembly on ia32 machines which is faster (it only applies to software renderer)
Install the demo files (hexen2-demodata) and configure for use
Link to the opengl libraries at compile time
Install and setup the updated light maps
Enable cd audio playback support through SDL
